import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min"; import axios from "axios"; export default function Addsalary() { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); let boxstyle = { background: "white", padding: "21px", borderTop: "5px solid #004dffe8", borderRadius: "5px", }; function calculate() { let n1 = parseInt(document.getElementById("num1").value); let n2 = parseInt(document.getElementById("num2").value); let sum = n1 + n2; // console.log(sum document.getElementById("total").value = sum; } useEffect(()=>{ const fetchDepartment=async()=>{ // try{ // const res=axios.get("https://localhost:3001/manageDepartment") // } } }) useEffect(() => { const fetchUsers = async () => { try { const res = await axios.get("https://localhost:3001/staffList"); console.log(res.json()); // Assuming staffList response is an array of objects with 'name' property setUsers(res.data); // Assuming the response data is an array of users } catch (err) { console.log("Error fetching details", err); } }; fetchUsers(); }, []); return ( <> {/*
A simple success alertâ€”check it out!
